title: Which was the first element discovered by a scientist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Lots of elements were known before science was recognized as being separate from life in general. Imagine spending all your life on one long camping trip, starting only with what you could pick up off the ground. If you managed to survive for a while, you’d get pretty serious about anything that promised to improve your life. Early humans were the best scientists. But we don’t know their names. For an example a little closer to your intent, check out Antoine Lavoisier - Wikipedia.
